characteristic.name: Chromaticity in CCT and Duv Values
characteristic.description:
The Chromaticity in CCT and Duv Values characteristic is used to represent the combination of the Correlated Color Temperature characteristic and the Chromatic Distance From Planckian characteristic.
The structure of this characteristic is defined below.

structure.description: Refer to the Correlated Color Temperature characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.correlated_color_temperature}
Refer to the Chromatic Distance From Planckian characteristic in \autoref{sec:org.bluetooth.characteristic.chromatic_distance_from_planckian}
